dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Rows
dumbbell.description: Bend knees slightly, hinge at hips with flat back. Pull dumbbells to chest, squeezing shoulder blades together. Lower slowly.

dumbbell.name: Single Arm Dumbbell Rows
dumbbell.description: Place one knee and hand on bench, other foot on floor. Pull dumbbell to hip, keeping back straight. Alternate sides.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Pullovers
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbell with both hands over chest. Lower behind head while keeping arms slightly bent. Return to start.

dumbbell.name: Reverse Grip Dumbbell Rows
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells with palms facing forward. Pull to chest, focusing on lower lats. Keep elbows close to body.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Deadlifts
dumbbell.description: Stand with dumbbells at thighs. Hinge at hips, lower weights toward floor with straight legs. Return to standing by squeezing glutes.

dumbbell.name: Bent Over Dumbbell Rows
dumbbell.description: Bend at 45-degree angle with flat back. Pull dumbbells to lower chest. Keep core engaged throughout movement.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Shrugs
dumbbell.description: Stand straight, hold dumbbells at sides. Shrug shoulders toward ears, hold briefly, then lower. Avoid rolling shoulders.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Reverse Flys
dumbbell.description: Bend at hips with flat back, slight knee bend. Raise dumbbells out to sides at shoulder height. Squeeze shoulder blades.

bodyweight.name: Pull-ups
bodyweight.description: Hang from bar with overhand grip. Pull body up until chin clears bar. Lower slowly with control.

bodyweight.name: Chin-ups
bodyweight.description: Hang from bar with underhand grip. Pull body up, focusing on biceps and back. Lower under control.

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Rows
bodyweight.description: Lie under sturdy table or bar. Pull chest toward hands, keeping body straight. Lower slowly.

bodyweight.name: Supermans
bodyweight.description: Lie face down, arms extended forward. Lift chest, arms, and legs off floor. Hold briefly, lower slowly.

bodyweight.name: Prone Cobras
bodyweight.description: Lie face down, hands behind head. Lift chest off floor while squeezing shoulder blades. Hold and lower.

bodyweight.name: Reverse Snow Angels
bodyweight.description: Lie face down, arms at sides. Sweep arms up and back like making snow angels. Keep thumbs pointing up.

bodyweight.name: Wall Angels
bodyweight.description: Stand with back against wall, arms bent 90 degrees. Slide arms up and down wall while keeping contact.

bodyweight.name: Scapular Pull-ups
bodyweight.description: Hang from bar. Pull shoulder blades down and together without bending arms. Hold briefly, relax.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Curls
dumbbell.description: Stand with palms facing forward. Curl dumbbells toward shoulders, keeping elbows stationary. Lower slowly.

dumbbell.name: Hammer Curls
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other. Curl up toward shoulders. Keep wrists straight throughout.

dumbbell.name: Concentration Curls
dumbbell.description: Sit, rest elbow on inner thigh. Curl dumbbell while isolating bicep. Focus on muscle contraction.

dumbbell.name: Incline Dumbbell Curls
dumbbell.description: Sit on incline bench, let arms hang straight. Curl dumbbells with full range of motion. Control negative.

dumbbell.name: Preacher Curls
dumbbell.description: Rest upper arms on preacher bench. Curl dumbbells while keeping arms stationary. Focus on bicep peak.

dumbbell.name: Zottman Curls
dumbbell.description: Curl with palms up, rotate to palms down at top, lower slowly. Reverse grip on way up.

dumbbell.name: Reverse Curls
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells with palms facing down. Curl up, focusing on forearms and brachialis. Keep elbows tight.

dumbbell.name: Cross Body Curls
dumbbell.description: Curl dumbbell across body toward opposite shoulder. Rotate wrist as you curl. Alternate sides.

bodyweight.name: Chin-ups
bodyweight.description: Hang from bar with underhand grip. Pull body up until chin clears bar. Focus on bicep contraction.

bodyweight.name: Isometric Chin-up Holds
bodyweight.description: Pull chin over bar and hold position for time. Lower slowly. Build static strength and endurance.

bodyweight.name: Towel Curls
bodyweight.description: Loop towel over sturdy object. Grip towel ends and curl body toward hands. Adjust difficulty with grip.

bodyweight.name: Doorway Curls
bodyweight.description: Stand in doorway, grip sides at shoulder height. Lean back and pull body forward using biceps.

bodyweight.name: Resistance Band Curls
bodyweight.description: Stand on resistance band. Grip handles and curl up like dumbbell curls. Increase tension by standing wider.

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Bicep Curls
bodyweight.description: Sit on floor, knees bent, hands on floor behind you. Pull body toward hands using biceps.

bodyweight.name: Close Grip Pull-ups
bodyweight.description: Hang from bar with narrow grip. Pull body up, focusing on biceps. Keep hands close together.

bodyweight.name: Negative Chin-ups
bodyweight.description: Jump to chin-up position, lower slowly taking 3-5 seconds. Build eccentric strength for full chin-ups.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Overhead Extensions
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbell with both hands overhead. Lower behind head by bending elbows. Extend arms back up.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Skull Crushers
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbells over chest. Lower to sides of head by bending elbows. Extend back up.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Kickbacks
dumbbell.description: Bend forward, upper arm parallel to floor. Extend arm back by straightening elbow. Squeeze tricep.

dumbbell.name: Close Grip Dumbbell Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbells together over chest. Lower to chest, press up keeping dumbbells close.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Floor Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on floor, hold dumbbells over chest. Lower until triceps touch floor, press back up.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Tricep Extensions
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbell with both hands. Extend arms vertically, lower behind head, repeat.

dumbbell.name: Single Arm Overhead Extensions
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbell in one hand overhead. Lower behind head, extend back up. Support elbow with other hand if needed.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Tricep Pullovers
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbell with both hands. Lower behind head keeping arms straight. Pull back over chest.

bodyweight.name: Diamond Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place hands close together forming diamond shape with thumbs and index fingers. Lower chest to hands.

bodyweight.name: Dips
bodyweight.description: Use parallel bars or sturdy chairs. Lower body by bending elbows until 90-degree angle. Press back up.

bodyweight.name: Tricep Dips on Bench
bodyweight.description: Sit on bench edge, hands next to hips. Slide off bench, lower body by bending elbows. Press back up.

bodyweight.name: Close Grip Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place hands closer than shoulder-width. Lower chest to hands, keeping elbows close to body.

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Tricep Extensions
bodyweight.description: Kneel on floor, place forearms on ground. Push body forward using triceps, then back to start.

bodyweight.name: Wall Dips
bodyweight.description: Stand facing wall, hands on wall at shoulder height. Lean forward and bend elbows. Push back to start.

bodyweight.name: Floor Tricep Extensions
bodyweight.description: Lie on floor, place hands near shoulders. Push body up by extending arms. Lower slowly.

bodyweight.name: Decline Diamond Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place feet on elevated surface. Perform diamond push-ups for increased difficulty.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on bench, hold dumbbells over chest. Lower to chest level, press back up. Keep controlled motion.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Flys
dumbbell.description: Lie on bench, arms extended with slight bend. Lower arms out to sides, raise back up like hugging tree.

dumbbell.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on incline bench (30-45 degrees). Press dumbbells upward focusing on upper chest. Control negative.

dumbbell.name: Decline Dumbbell Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on decline bench. Press dumbbells upward focusing on lower chest. Keep stable throughout.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Pullovers
dumbbell.description: Lie across bench, hold dumbbell with both hands. Lower behind head, pull back over chest. Stretch chest.

dumbbell.name: Single Arm Dumbbell Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on flat bench, press one dumbbell at a time. Engage core for stability. Alternate sides.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Squeeze Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on bench, press dumbbells together. Squeeze throughout movement to engage inner chest.

dumbbell.name: Flat Dumbbell Press
dumbbell.description: Lie on flat bench, press dumbbells from chest to overhead. Keep elbows at 45-degree angle.

bodyweight.name: Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Hands shoulder-width apart. Lower chest to floor, keeping body straight. Push back to start position.

bodyweight.name: Wide Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place hands wider than shoulders. Lower chest, focus on outer chest. Keep elbows flared slightly.

bodyweight.name: Close Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place hands close together. Lower chest to hands, keeping elbows close to body. Targets inner chest.

bodyweight.name: Decline Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place feet on elevated surface. Lower chest to floor, emphasizing upper chest. Increase height for difficulty.

bodyweight.name: Incline Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place hands on elevated surface. Lower chest to hands. Easier variation, good for beginners.

bodyweight.name: Diamond Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Form diamond with hands. Lower chest to hands. Targets triceps and inner chest.

bodyweight.name: Plyometric Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Push up explosively so hands leave floor. Clap hands if possible. Land softly.

bodyweight.name: Push-up Holds
bodyweight.description: Hold push-up position at various points. Build isometric strength and stability.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
dumbbell.description: Sit or stand, hold dumbbells at shoulder height. Press overhead until arms fully extended. Lower slowly.

dumbbell.name: Lateral Raises
dumbbell.description: Stand with dumbbells at sides. Raise arms out to shoulder height, leading with elbows. Lower slowly.

dumbbell.name: Front Raises
dumbbell.description: Stand with dumbbells at thighs. Raise arms straight forward to shoulder height. Lower with control.

dumbbell.name: Reverse Flys
dumbbell.description: Bend at hips with flat back. Raise dumbbells out to sides at shoulder height. Squeeze shoulder blades.

dumbbell.name: Upright Rows
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells in front of body. Pull upward along torso, leading with elbows. Stop at chest height.

dumbbell.name: Arnold Press
dumbbell.description: Start with palms facing chest. Press overhead while rotating palms forward. Reverse on way down.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Shrugs
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells at sides. Shrug shoulders toward ears, hold briefly. Avoid rolling shoulders.

dumbbell.name: Face Pulls with Dumbbell
dumbbell.description: Lie on incline bench, hold dumbbell with both hands. Pull toward face, leading with elbows.

bodyweight.name: Pike Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Start in downward dog position. Lower head toward floor, press back up. Targets shoulders.

bodyweight.name: Handstand Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Kick up into handstand against wall. Lower head toward floor, press back up. Advanced shoulder exercise.

bodyweight.name: Wall Walks
bodyweight.description: Start in push-up position facing wall. Walk feet up wall into handstand. Walk back down carefully.

bodyweight.name: Shoulder Taps
bodyweight.description: In push-up position, tap opposite shoulder while keeping hips stable. Alternate sides.

bodyweight.name: Plank Shoulder Taps
bodyweight.description: In plank position, tap opposite shoulder. Keep core engaged and hips from rocking.

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Shoulder Press
bodyweight.description: Sit with knees bent, hands on floor behind you. Press body upward using shoulders.

bodyweight.name: Incline Push-ups
bodyweight.description: Place hands on elevated surface. Lower chest to hands. Emphasizes shoulders more than chest.

bodyweight.name: Bear Crawls
bodyweight.description: On all fours, crawl forward keeping back flat and knees off floor. Engages shoulders and core.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Side Bends
dumbbell.description: Stand holding dumbbell in one hand. Bend sideways at waist, lowering dumbbell. Return to upright position.

dumbbell.name: Russian Twists with Dumbbell
dumbbell.description: Sit on floor, lean back slightly. Hold dumbbell, twist torso side to side. Keep feet off floor.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Crunches
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbell on chest. Perform crunch while holding weight. Exhale at top.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Leg Raises
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbell between feet. Raise legs to 90 degrees, lower slowly. Keep lower back pressed down.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Wood Chops
dumbbell.description: Stand with dumbbell. Rotate torso diagonally upward across body. Alternate sides. Keep arms straight.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Plank Rows
dumbbell.description: In plank position with dumbbells. Row one dumbbell while maintaining plank. Alternate sides.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Sit-ups
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold dumbbell on chest. Perform full sit-up while holding weight. Control movement.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Bicycle Crunches
dumbbell.description: Lie on back, hold light dumbbell. Perform bicycle crunches while holding weight for resistance.

bodyweight.name: Plank
bodyweight.description: Hold push-up position on forearms. Keep body straight from head to heels. Engage core throughout.

bodyweight.name: Crunches
bodyweight.description: Lie on back, knees bent. Lift shoulders off floor using abs. Lower slowly. Exhale at top.

bodyweight.name: Leg Raises
bodyweight.description: Lie on back, hands under hips. Raise legs to 90 degrees, lower slowly. Keep lower back pressed down.

bodyweight.name: Russian Twists
bodyweight.description: Sit on floor, lean back slightly. Twist torso side to side. Keep feet off floor for difficulty.

bodyweight.name: Mountain Climbers
bodyweight.description: In push-up position, alternate bringing knees to chest quickly. Keep hips down and core tight.

bodyweight.name: Bicycle Crunches
bodyweight.description: Lie on back, bring opposite elbow to knee. Alternate sides in pedaling motion. Keep lower back down.

bodyweight.name: Side Plank
bodyweight.description: Support body on one forearm and side of foot. Keep body straight. Hold on both sides.

bodyweight.name: Hollow Body Hold
bodyweight.description: Lie on back, lift shoulders and legs off floor. Keep lower back pressed down. Hold position.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Squats
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells at shoulders. Squat until thighs parallel to floor. Keep chest up and back straight.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Lunges
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells at sides. Step forward, lower back knee toward floor. Push back to start. Alternate legs.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Deadlifts
dumbbell.description: Stand with dumbbells at thighs. Hinge at hips, lower weights toward floor. Return to standing.

dumbbell.name: Goblet Squats
dumbbell.description: Hold one dumbbell vertically at chest. Squat deep, keeping chest up. Use elbows to push knees out.

dumbbell.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
dumbbell.description: Place rear foot on bench. Hold dumbbells, lower into lunge. Front thigh parallel to floor.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Step-ups
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells, step onto bench with one foot. Step up fully, step down. Alternate legs.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Calf Raises
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells at sides. Rise onto toes, hold briefly. Lower heels below step if possible.

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlifts
dumbbell.description: Hold dumbbells in front. Hinge at hips with slight knee bend. Lower weights to mid-shin, return.

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Squats
bodyweight.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width. Squat until thighs parallel to floor. Keep chest up and back straight.

bodyweight.name: Lunges
bodyweight.description: Step forward, lower back knee toward floor. Front knee at 90 degrees. Push back to start. Alternate legs.

bodyweight.name: Jump Squats
bodyweight.description: Perform squat, then jump explosively upward. Land softly and immediately go into next squat.

bodyweight.name: Pistol Squats
bodyweight.description: Stand on one leg, extend other forward. Squat deeply on standing leg. Use support for balance.

bodyweight.name: Wall Sit
bodyweight.description: Lean against wall, slide down until thighs parallel to floor. Hold position with back against wall.

bodyweight.name: Calf Raises
bodyweight.description: Stand on edge of step. Rise onto toes, hold briefly. Lower heels below step for full range.

bodyweight.name: Glute Bridges
bodyweight.description: Lie on back, knees bent. Lift hips toward ceiling, squeezing glutes. Lower slowly.

bodyweight.name: Single Leg Squats
bodyweight.description: Stand on one leg, squat as deep as possible. Use support for balance if needed.
